name: Pixel Storm (Hunternox)
description:
The purpose of this game is to make the best score ever by trying to catch a maximum of grapes. However, the elements of nature like wind and rocks are against you...

This platfomer has been made in Python and it contains exe for Windows users without the following installed: Pygame and Python.

Controls :

Moves : Arrow Keys

Jump : Space Bar

Fullscreen : F Key

Quit : Escape Key
